title: The Wither Chronicles
description: The king expects a witch could solve their drought problem. Meet Evelyn, an innocent eighteen-year-old farmer who people say is a witch. She can't make it rain, and everybody seems mad about it.She is banished, but finds a new land and a will to live. Surviving off the land in 600 AD is challenging.Enter Derek, a young man only interested in money and sex. The more of both, the better.In the end, a whole lot of money would mean less tilling, weeding, and carrying water.Fantasy with a quick pace and questionable characters.
author: Geoffrey Porter
